item.title: Ep. 01 – 1) Episode Title: "Revolutionizing mRNA Delivery"
item.description:
2) Summary: This episode delves into the latest advancements in mRNA delivery systems, focusing on lipid nanoparticles. We explore novel techniques for assessing mRNA integrity and encapsulation, enhancing cellular uptake, and targeting delivery to specific cells. Additionally, we discuss breakthroughs in T-cell engineering for cancer treatment using FAP-CAR mRNA. Join us as we uncover how these innovations are poised to transform therapeutic applications and improve delivery efficiency.

Discussed Papers

  • Two-dimensional AEX – IP-RPLC: New insights on mRNA integrity and encapsulation efficiency of mRNA-lipid nanoparticle formulations
    Analytica Chimica Acta
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.aca.2026.345215
  • Targeted Lipid Nanoparticle Delivery of FAP-CAR mRNA Enables Potent In Vivo T-Cell Engineering Against Pancreatic Tumors
    Cancer Immunology Research
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.1158/2326-6066.cir-25-0663
  • Lipid-Based Ionic Liquids Enable Efficient mRNA Intracellular Delivery
    Chemistry Letters
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.1093/chemle/upag025
  • A new type of lipid nanoparticles with sphingomyelin-induced active lipid raft structures for improved mRNA cellular uptake
    Journal of Controlled Release
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.jconrel.2026.114640
  • Protective effects of bee pollen and its solid lipid nanoparticle formulation against lead acetate-induced pulmonary toxicity in Wistar rats
    Proceedings of the Indian National Science Academy
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.1007/s43538-026-00703-3
  • Toward In Vivo CAR T Cell Therapy: Perfecting CAR and Lipid Nanoparticle Design
    Nano Letters
    DOI: https://doi.org/10.1021/acs.nanolett.5c05535
